items.summary: Add an app-wide “site disabled / maintenance mode” gate that, when enabled, prevents the marketing website UI (routes, header, footer, pages) from rendering and instead renders a single standalone screen indicating the app is offline/unpublished.

Implement the disabled/maintenance gate as a simple, explicit configuration mechanism that can be changed without touching immutable frontend paths (e.g., by toggling a single constant or reading a Vite environment variable in the non-immutable entry path currently used by the app: `frontend/src/entry.tsx`).
